title: Not enough Honors as a Support player.. but I am gold, GG RIOT
body: Played late in season...went gold in 2 queues .... no exotic unique skin due to being a support main and getting no honor because I am not playing the carry role, Riot wants to punish players in a new way.. THANKS RIOT been playing since season 1.... Time to go back to GW2 and give them my money since you love to screw over your player base.
